entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
